Author: Universal Bit Project
Title: Unibit - The Universal Bit Project
Body: http://i.imgur.com/jBmeHV8.png  UNIBIT - Universal Network Integration of Blockchain Information Technology  The Universal Bit Project curates the growth and development of toolkits and resources for developers, teams, and organizations to deploy applications on a framework for Multichain & IPFS (InterPlanetary File System).  UniBit is an incentive network within a distributed computational token based ecosystem. Our mission is to create ambiguous and scalable solutions for problems that require more security & features than traditional databases can offer.   Resources: UniversalBitProject.com Block Explorer Github  Applications: Scout.Click - Private & Ad Free Search Engine. decentralized features coming soon..  Bounty Programs: Bitcointalk Bounty Thread  Releases, Q1 & Q2:      - web wallet      - initial bounty program      - roll out of flagship applications      - begin distribution of Unibit tokens  Communty Channels: Telegram - Discord Social Media: Twitter

Author: Universal Bit Project
Title: Unibit - The Universal Bit Project
Body: Here is a brief recap on the happenings of late:  We have grown our team which includes a few developers, allowing us access to a larger pool of resources. Content such as websites for the applications, unibit labs, and the unibit chain are near finished. Web wallet is near finished. Looking to launch the wallet and subsequent initial bounty program within the next few weeks. We may also be able to deliver on a product soon as well.  Our launch party is on Nov 2nd. at our HQ in New Braunfels, TX, with guest speaker Adam Kokesh. Parts of the event will be filmed and shared. If you are in the area, you are more than welcome to join us.   Looking forward to sharing these new developments!  +Jon Stokes

Author: aseriousgogetta
Title: Unibit - The Universal Bit Project
Body: Had a great time at the event. Even scored an autographed copy of FREEDOM! 3rd Edition!  Adam has my vote.

Author: Universal Bit Project
Title: Unibit - The Universal Bit Project
Body: We're getting to the point where will will start to focus on bounties, distribution and growing the network. Lots of exciting developments have been going on in the past few months, as we have been experimenting with the Unibit framework. One notable mention is winning an API challenge at the SXSW hackathon, by demonstrating the functionality of multichain for voting and utilizing AWS API.     Quick updates:  We are on track to releasing our web wallet by the end of Q1.  Access the legacy version of the private & ad-free search engine here: http://Scout.Click    Distribution phase of the Unibit token will begin around the release of the web-wallet, as well as the initial bounty program.  You can find us in our community channels:   Slack - Telegram - Discord - Reddit

Author: Treasurer
Title: Unibit - The Universal Bit Project
Body: Where is your White paper? Without White Paper, there is no point in going out on ICO, even with a wallet.

Author: Universal Bit Project
Title: Unibit - The Universal Bit Project
Body: We're not doing an ICO, only interested in delivering products, building a valuable network, and culturing a progressive crypto community! Let us know how you like our search feature: http://scout.click  Our whitepaper will be made public in due time.

Author: aseriousgogetta
Title: Unibit - The Universal Bit Project
Body: In the past 12 months we have went from 3 strangers who met by using LocalBitcoins to 5 partners, 100+ users & we are all working towards common goals on a semi-regular volunteer basis. We have organized and ran events & meetups, had guest speakers attend, have ourselves attended conferences & hackathons, & even released an open source GUI wallet for multichain software during that time.  I am very happy to be working with you all & super excited to see what we build together in the future.   https://image.ibb.co/hq05p7/umw_github.png
